CustomField.formula:
if ( ISBLANK( Pick_up_Date__c ) , "" ,
if ( ( Pick_up_Date__c - NOW() )>=7 , IMAGE("/resource/1539516805000/Flag_green?", "GreenFlag",35,35) , if ( AND( ( Pick_up_Date__c -NOW())<=6 , Pick_up_Date__c -NOW()>=0 ) , IMAGE("/resource/1539516821000/Flag_yellow?","YellowFlag",35,35) , IF ( ( Pick_up_Date__c - NOW())<0 , IMAGE("/resource/1539516784000/Flag_red?","RedFlag",35,35) , IMAGE("/resource/1553031783000/Opp_ClosedLock?","Closed",35,35) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Etat
